title: How to Get the Ghoul Ecology Perk in Fallout 3

steps.headline: Download the Point Lookout DLC.
steps.description: Alternatively, you can play the game of the year edition, which has all 4 DLC's pre-installed.

steps.headline: Talk to Tobar the Ferryman at the Riverboat Harbor.
steps.description: Buy a ticket to Point Lookout (300 caps).

steps.headline: Travel to Point Lookout.
steps.description: Talk to Tobar about the surrounding area. He will tell you about Plik's Safari, and will mark it on your map.

steps.headline: Place a marker on Plik's Safari.
Climb down to reach it.
steps.description: It is located on the side of a cliff, so be careful.

steps.headline: Go inside.
steps.description: Travel down the tunnel until you find Plik.

steps.headline: Go into the small room to the right.
steps.description: On the table should be a journal.

steps.headline: Activate the journal.
steps.description: You will receive the Ghoul Ecology perk. You now do +5 damage to Ghouls.

text: Download the Point Lookout DLC. Alternatively, you can play the game of the year edition, which has all 4 DLC's pre-installed. Talk to Tobar the Ferryman at the Riverboat Harbor. Buy a ticket to Point Lookout (300 caps). Travel to Point Lookout. Talk to Tobar about the surrounding area. He will tell you about Plik's Safari, and will mark it on your map. Place a marker on Plik's Safari. Travel to it. Climb down to reach it. It is located on the side of a cliff, so be careful. Go inside. Travel down the tunnel until you find Plik. Go into the small room to the right. On the table should be a journal. Activate the journal. You will receive the Ghoul Ecology perk. You now do +5 damage to Ghouls.
